title: Drawing, "Designs for Painted Panels Referring to Fortune and to Jacques Necker (1733-1804)", 1788–90
medium: Black chalk, pen and ink, brush and white gouache and sepia washes on two pieces of off-white laid paper, joined
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Designs for Painted Panels Referring to Fortune and to Jacques Necker (1733-1804)", 1788–90.
1788–90. Black chalk, pen and ink, brush and white gouache and sepia washes on two pieces of off-white laid paper, joined. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-70-1.
